# 02.-BootCamp

## For Node.js
```
npm install ethers@5
```

## 2.0. DocumentSignature
```
npm install @openzeppelin/merkle-tree
```


```

## 3.0. Airdrop

## 3.1. Airdrop merkle proof
```
npm install @openzeppelin/merkle-tree
```

```
